bug.question: I am green and jump. I like to eat grass. What am I?

hints.text: ğŸŒ± I live in the garden
ğŸ¦µ I have strong legs
ğŸ¶ Sometimes you hear me 'Chirp!'

bug.question: I crawl on the ground. I carry food to my home. What am I?

hints.text: ğŸ’ª I am very strong for my size
ğŸ˜ï¸ I live with lots of friends
ğŸœ I am very small

bug.question: I have a shell on my back, and I move very slowly. What am I?

hints.text: ğŸŒ I leave a slimy trail
ğŸ¥¬ I like to eat garden plants
ğŸ  I carry my house with me

bug.question: I make a sticky web to catch food. What am I?

hints.text: ğŸ•¸ï¸ My home is made of silk
ğŸ•·ï¸ I have eight legs
ğŸª° I like to eat flies

bug.question: I buzz around and sometimes sting you. I make honey. What am I?

hints.text: ğŸŒ» I love to collect nectar
ğŸ‘‘ I live in a hive with a queen
ğŸ¯ My honey is sweet

bug.question: I have spots on my back and bring good luck. What am I?

hints.text: ğŸ I am small and round
ğŸ I eat aphids on plants
ğŸ”´ I am often red with black spots

bug.question: I glow in the dark. What am I?

hints.text: ğŸŒŸ I light up at night
ğŸ”¥ My light helps me find friends
ğŸ”¦ I am not a fire, but I look like one

bug.question: I build a home out of sticks and pebbles in the water. What am I?

hints.text: ğŸªµ I use bits of plants and rocks
ğŸ’§ I live in a pond or stream
ğŸ› I will become a Caddisfly

hints.text: ğŸ§¥ I like to live in closets
ğŸ› I start as a larva
ğŸ¦‹ My larvae eat wool and cotton

food.question: I am yellow and yummy. Monkeys love to peel me. What am I?

hints.text: I am a fruit.
Monkeys eat me.
I am shaped like a crescent.

food.question: I am round and juicy, and sometimes red or green. You can bite right into me! What am I?

hints.text: I grow on trees.
I can be many colors.
Sometimes worms like me.

food.question: I am white and cold. You eat me with a spoon. I'm very yummy on a hot day. What am I?

hints.text: I live in the freezer.
You need a spoon to eat me.
I come in many flavors.

food.question: I am orange and crunchy. Rabbits like to eat me. What am I?

hints.text: I am a vegetable.
Bunnies love me.
They say I help you see better.

food.question: I am long and brown and you peel me to eat me. Monkeys and squirrels also like me!

hints.text: I grow in a shell.
I taste good in chocolate.
Squirrels hide me for winter.

food.question: I am small and green and grow in a pod. You can eat me as a snack. What am I?

hints.text: I am a vegetable.
I am often served with dinner.
I am round and green.

food.question: I am long and you can put things on me to make a tasty lunch. What am I?

hints.text: I am made from flour.
You can make a sandwich with me.
You can toast me in a toaster.

food.question: I'm made from milk, and I can be yellow, white, or orange. You can eat me with crackers or in a sandwich. What am I?

hints.text: Cows make the key ingredient for me.
Mice sometimes like to eat me.
I am often melted on pizza.

food.question: I come from a chicken, you can scramble me, fry me, or boil me. What am I?

hints.text: I can be cracked to cook with.
I am good for breakfast.
Chickens lay me.

food.question: I am round and red, and made into a sauce for pasta. What am I?

hints.text: I am a fruit, but people think I'm a vegetable.
I am great with spaghetti.
I am used to make pizza.
